item.title: Increasing the Size of the Disk of VM
item.author: Author
item.description: Intro As we are developing more and more projects on my VM, we might get a problem which is the disk would be full. Obviously, we can clean up our file system to free up more space. However, if you got the issue frequently, it is better to increase the size of your disk for your VM. Pre-check for your disks First of all, you need to know the status of your disks at beginning.
